job_description:
Position: Senior Java Developer
Location: Mississauga, ON
Key Responsibilities:
Key Responsibilities:
Work closely with information security managers to define or support new business processes and functions for systems.
Translate requirement to solutions; identify strengths, weaknesses, suggest improvement areas for technology processes.
Work as part of an Agile delivery team as the Full Stack Engineer supporting feature development.
Perform hands-on component development using Spring framework (Spring Boot, Spring Security, Spring JPA).
Focus on producing high quality deliverables and assist with global rollouts as per agreed milestones.
Conduct research; gain knowledge of best practices; support the business with recommendations, guidance and advice around feasibility to support selection/purchase of new solutions.
Guide stakeholders within defined parameters related to specific Technology Controls and Information Security programs, policies, standards and incidents.
Lead discussions with technology stakeholders and partners, service or platform owners to integrate all technology security components and address control gaps.
·        Encourage teams to implement risk mitigation best practices and promote a resilient risk management culture.
 Qualifications: 
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Sciences, Information Systems or equivalent; eight (8) plus year relevant experience.
Understanding of Agile Software Development or equivalently certified will be preferred.
Understanding of information security controls preferred.
 Technology Skills:
Hands on experience on Core Java/JEE, Spring framework, JPA, Design Patterns, REST - Micro Services Architecture.
Hands on experience on Agile Software Development, Test Driven Development, Clean Code Practices, XP, CI/CD delivery.
Hands on experience on one or, more databases like Oracle, Mongo DB, MS SQL Server.
Hands on experience on Angular, jQuery, CSS will be an asset.
Working knowledge on messaging frameworks like Kafka or, other messaging tools.
Working knowledge on cloud services like AWS, GCP etc. Someone with Cloud certifications will be an asset.
Working knowledge on analytical and reporting frameworks like Spark, Apache POI.
·        Strong analytical skills and familiarity with JIRA and Confluent.
Expert using source-control management software such as Git & BitBucket.
Working knowledge on experience with CI/CD tools (LightSpeed, Jenkins, TeamCity, uDeploy).
Working knowledge on with DevOps & DevSecOps along with tools like SonarQube, BlackDuck, Kibana, AppDynamics.
 Other Competencies:
Effectively work in a dynamic and fast changing technology platform.
Ability to quickly ramp-up on new / emerging technologies as required.
Focus in web-based software delivery technology.
Preferably more than 10 years of experience with design and development of web applications/platforms.
·        Excellent communication skills – written and verbal, as well as presentation and interpersonal skills.
